24.58.text: We need to eat milk and dairy products because they're full of calcium which is good for our bones

100.94.text: It has to do with food because the number one contributer to the environmental problems we face today

109.30.text: And what I mean by animal agriculture is the farming of animals for food.

112.68.text: And there are so many lies here !

114.40.text: We're told to reduce pollution and greenhouse gases we should just drive less.

120.24.text: But animal agriculture causes more greenhouse gas emissions than all transportations combined.

125.98.text: That's cars, trains, planes, buses, all of it.

128.78.text: To save the Rainforest, they tell us to compost and use less paper.

133.56.text: But you know what the number one cause of the destruction of the Amazon is ?

139.08.text: Animal agriculture is responsible for 91% of the destruction of the Amazon Rainforest.

146.10.text: No amount of composting and recycling is gonna fix that.

149.50.text: And finally to save water and stop the stroke that we're in they tell us to take shorter showers.

156.84.text: But did you know that approximately 2,500 gallons of water are used to produce 1 pound of beef.

164.22.text: Approximately 1,000 gallons of water are needed to make 1 gallon of milk.

168.90.text: Growing crops to feed livestock consumes 56% of water in the United States

174.00.text: You can take the shorter showers that you want.

178.04.text: And it pales in comparison to the impact that the meat and dairy industry is having.

187.14.text: Refined carbs like white bread, white pasta, donuts...

194.58.text: You know what else would cause weight gain ?

197.54.text: A substance that's been designed in its essence to turn a baby calf into a giant cow.
